name: kaizen-studio
description: AI-powered background removal studio with GoPro integration

scripts.setup: python -m venv venv && npm run pip-install && npm run download-weights
scripts.download-weights: if not exist weights\mobile_sam.pt (mkdir weights 2>nul & echo Download mobile_sam.pt from https://github.com/ChaoningZhang/MobileSAM/raw/master/weights/mobile_sam.pt into weights/ & echo Then run: npm start)
